title: UNHCR Southern Africa
subtitle:
Over 9,500 people who were forced to flee & sought refugee in Angola  have made the voluntary decision to return home to Democratic Republic of Congo .

Last week the Governments of Angola & DRC with @Refugees signed an agreement to facilitate their safe return

#WithRefugeespic.twitter.com/v6a42ERYWw

title: David Mbewa
subtitle: Tanzania says it will begin repatriation of all Burundian refugees on October 1, at the rate of 2,000 refugees per week until there are no more Burundian refugees in the country. pic.twitter.com/Wgd40xmQK6

title: Mimi Mefo Info
subtitle:
Today in Tapachula, North Mexico, the protest orchestrated by African migrants continued.

Mexican immigration officers are now using ladders to enter into their office as the refugees have blocked the road and gate.

Click link for details 
https://mimimefoinfos.com/over-1500-cameroonians-stranded-in-mexico-in-desperate-quest-to-enter-usa/ …pic.twitter.com/tIsqxvlGPo
